awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE SHAWNEE TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, PROVIDE OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES AND STRATEGIES TO PROMOTE RECYCLING, AND CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT FOR GEOSPATIAL SYSTEM.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FEDERAL FINANCIAL REPORT (FFR), QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN (QMP), AND GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM/GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM QUALITY ASSURANCE PROJECT PLAN (GIS/GPS QAPP). THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE SHAWNEE TRIBE AND SENECA-CAYUGA NATION.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE SHAWNEE TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, PROVIDE OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES AND RECYCLING, AND EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT PLANNING.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FEDERAL FINANCIAL REPORT (FFR), QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN (QMP), AND GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM/GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM QUALITY ASSURANCE PROJECT PLAN (GIS/GPS QAPP). THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE SHAWNEE TRIBE.
NEW AWARD FOR FY22 AND FY23 TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FAST ACT AND STRA-21 FUNDS. IN THE OVERALL AMOUNT OF $122,302.47

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development
